 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[stocks,setAllStocks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{/**
